description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. DESTRUCTION TANK is a full 3D TPS tank shooting game. The game features single player and multiplayer modes up to 4 players, choosing among five kind of tanks. If there isn't enough players the game creates them for you so you'll play against the computer.
description.short: DESTRUCTION TANK is a full 3D TPS tank shooting game. The game features single player and multiplayer modes up to 4 players, choosing among five kind of tanks. If there isn't enough players the game creates them for you so you'll play against the computer.
